General.Name: Shradha Infraprojects Limited
General.Description: Shradha Infraprojects Limited, an infrastructure development company, engages in the real estate development business in India. The company develops residential, commercial, retail, and social infrastructure projects. It is involved in the construction of commercial complexes, residential houses, and business premises or civil works, as well as deals in real estate properties. The company also provides engineering design and construction services. The company was formerly known as Shradha Infraprojects (Nagpur) Limited and changed its name to Shradha Infraprojects Limited in February 2019. Shradha Infraprojects Limited was incorporated in 1997 and is based in Nagpur, India.
